title: Early Black Friday deal drops the AirPods 2 to just $129 - the lowest price ever
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Score an early Black Friday deal on the 2019 Apple AirPods
article: Black Friday deals are dropping early at Amazon, and we've just spotted the AirPods 2 down to a record-low price. Amazon's latest sale has the AirPods with wireless charging case on sale for just $129 (was $199). That's a massive $70 discount and $30 less than last week's price. We typically see record-low prices on AirPods reserved for the upcoming Black Friday deals event, so we expect today's discount won't stick around for long.

The 2019 AirPods include Apple's powerful H1 Chip, resulting in faster pairing and seamless connectivity. The H1 Chip also allows you to use your voice to ask Siri questions. You can adjust the volume, skip songs, and make calls completely hands-free. The earbuds also come with a wireless charging case that offers 24 hours of battery overall, with 5 hours of battery life (three hours of talk time) on a single charge. If you're interested in Apple's latest earbuds, you can pre-order the AirPods 3 for $179 from Apple.

You can also look forward to upcoming bargains at the 2021 Apple AirPods Black Friday deals event and more Apple Black Friday deals. You can also shop for more offers with the best AirPod deals and sales and see the best AirPods Pro deals and sales that are happening now.
